籤詩版本二:
Ndinoda kukwezva iyo Immortal Gui kupinda muImba yeToad, asi ini ndichavhura gedhi rekudenga ndokurega iwe uende.
Kamwe kamwe, mashoko akanaka, munhu wose anoseka maruva ari pamusoro pegomo
詩意:
Iyi hexagram inobata chiratidzo chekusafa osmanthus.
Panofanira kuva nevanhu vanokudzwa mune zvose.
解曰: Zvido zvevatengesi. Pane (kwete) ngozi pakuipfeka. Chirwere chakagadziriswa uye nyaya yakagadziriswa. Ita chero zvaunogona.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Iva ane mutsa uye ane hanya
Gao Huaide (926-982), zita rekuremekedza Zangyong, akaberekerwa muChangshan, Zhending (yava kunzi Zhengding, Hebei).
Munguva ye "Chenqiao Mutiny", nokuti Gao Huaide aitsigira Zhao Kuangyin samambo, akakwidziridzwa kuva mutevedzeri wemukuru mukuru pamberi pemuzinda.
Gao Huaide akaroorawo hanzvadzi yaSong Taizu Zhao Kuangyin (Zhao Kuangyin aiva nehanzvadzi mbiri, mumwe akafa achiri mudiki uye akazonzi Princess Chen; mumwe akanga akaroorwa naMiford, asi zvinosuruvarisa kuti murume wake akafa uye akanga ava chirikadzi, saka Zhao Kuangyin akamutumidza kuti mwanasikana mukuru weYan). Zita repamutemo raive Prince Consort Duwei.
(Kuve gamba rekutanga uye kuroora hanzvadzi yamambo, hapana chikonzero chekunetseka nezvekusava nechinzvimbo chepamutemo.)
聖意: Musha hauna kumira mushe rombo rakanaka kune wega, rombo rakanaka kune wega, kune bhizinesi, kutadzisa wanano, irombo rakanaka kune vanofamba netsoka, kune ngozi kumunda. Silkworms,hazvina kunaka kumombe nhanhatu,hazvina kunaka kutsvaga vanhu,zvinonetsa kuwana vanhu imhosva,zvakashata,irombo rakanaka pakutama,irombo rakanaka rombo rakanaka, irombo rakanaka, chirwere, igomo uye irombo rakanaka.
古人: Iva ane mutsa uye ane hanya
